text.headline: Three Body
text.text: Timeline of the book series Three Body, also known as Remembrance of Earth's Past by Cinxin Liu.

text.headline: Higher Dimension Fragment
text.text: Higher Dimension Fragment passes through the Earth; Dolaris gets four-dimension ability for a short time.

events.display_date: Magic Age[[br]]4:00 PM May 3, 1453 [[dash]] 9:00 PM May 28, 1453

text.headline: Ye Wenjie's Father and Her Sister Die
text.text: Ye Wenjie's father and her sister die in the Great Proletarian Cultural Revolution.

text.headline: Ye Sends Message to Space
text.text: Ye sends radio waves to space using the solar amplifier.

text.headline: Trisolarans Receive Message
text.text:
The No.1379 Trisolaran Listener receives and decodes the message sent by Ye. It warns huamans not to reply to this message in its reply message.

Trisolarans know the existence of humans.

text.headline: Ye Replies
text.text: Ye receives the reply from the Trisolaran Listener; then she replies again.

text.headline: Yang dong Is Born
text.text: Ye's daughter Yang Dong is born.

text.headline: The First Trisolaris Fleet Is Launched
text.text: The First Trisolaris Fleet is launched towards the direction of the transmission of the signal sent by Ye.

text.headline: The First Trisolaris Fleet towards the Earth
text.text:
Trisolarans receive the reply from Ye; then they adjust the direction of the fleet towards the Earth.

Sophon project is launched.

text.headline: ETO Is Established
text.text: The Earth-Trisolaris Organization (ETO) is established. Ye is the lead.

text.headline: Sophons Are Made
text.text: Trisolarans make four Sophons using hydrogen nuclei. Trisolarans launch two of four Sophons towards the Earth at a speed that is close to lightspeed. They are used for stop the basic sciences of humans. The remaining two are used for communication.

text.headline: Sophons Arrive & Frontiers of Science Is Established
text.text:
Two Sophons launched by Trisolarans arrive at the Earth. The basic sciences of humans is stopped.

In the same year, the Frontiers of Science organization is established.

text.headline: The Beginning
text.text:
A lot of theorists and physicists commit suicide.

Yang commits suicide after she knows her mother Ye's secret.

Wang Miao, a nanotechnologist, initially contacts the Frontiers of Science. He meets Shi Qiang for the first time; after, he is invited to the operation center.

A countdown appears on Wang's retina. Someone who belongs to the Frontiers of Science tells him to pause his experiment. After Wang pauses the experiment, the countdown in his retina is paused and disappears.

Wang plays the Three Body game. He realizes who is the enemy of the Earth.

Shi designs the operation Guzheng. The government attacks a converted oil tanker of the ETO which is housing ETO's communication equipments with Trisolaris. From this action, Earth's government directly learns the existence of Trisolaris.

Ye talks about the cosmic sociology with Luo Ji. Ye dies of an illness.

Trisolarans and the ETO's pursuit of Luo begins.

text.headline: PDC Is Established
text.text:
The United Nations announces the beginning of the Crisis Era.

The Planetary Defense Council (PDC) is established.

Hibernation Technology is being used.

text.headline: Wallfacer Project
text.text:
The PDC Strategic Intelligence Agency (PIA) is established.

The Staircase Program is launched.

The General Assembly of the United Nations adopts Resolution No. 117 and announces that escapism is illegal.

The Wallfacer Project is launched. Frederick Tyler, Manuel Rey Diaz, Bill Hines, and Luo Ji are four Wallfacers.

The ETO appoints three Wallbreakers to assist the Trisolarans in identifying and undermining the strategies of the first three Wallfacers.

ETO attempts to assassinate Luo, but the attempt fails.

text.headline: Stars Our Destination Project
text.text:
The Stars Our Destination Project is launched.

Yun Tianming purchases the star DX3906 (possibly based on the real star HIP 80161), which is 286.5 light-years from the Sun.

Yun participates in the Staircase Program, and his brain is launched into space.

Cheng Xin, as the liaison of the Staircase Program, uses Hibernation Technology to travel into the future.

text.headline: Dark Forest Theory
text.text:
Luo understands the Dark Forest Theory. He sends a cosmic spell [[dash]] a mysterious broadcast that exposes the position of the star 187J3X1.

Luo is attacked by a genetic weapon deployed by the ETO. To survive and await treatment, he undergoes Hibernation Technology to travel into the future.

text.headline: ETO Is Eliminated
text.text: ETO is finally eliminated by the government.

text.headline: 187J3X1 Is Destroyed
text.text: The star 187J3X1 is attacked by the Photoid, which is a Dark Forest Strike from an unknown civilization.

text.headline: Earth Oberves the Attack
text.text:
The scientists on the Earth observe the strike that occurs on the star 187J3X1.

Luo's experiment is successfully finished.

text.headline: The Droplet
text.text:
Luo is revived, but his contributions are not appreciated. The Wallfacer Project is dismissed and widely seen as a failure.

A Droplet launched by the Trisolarans destroys almost the entire human space fleet. Humans are once again facing an overwhelming technological gap, just like 200 years earlier.

Two spaceships escape the Solar System. They want to rebuild the civilization elsewhere.

Luo resumes his Wallfacer role.

The Snow Project is launched under Luo¡¯s leadership.

text.headline: Dark Forest Deterrence
text.text: Luo completes the construction of the Dark Forest Deterrence. The Droplet and the Trisolaran fleet are forced to retreat. The Crisis Era ends, and the Deterrence Era begins.

text.headline: The Swordholder
text.text: Luo is the Swordholder.

text.headline: Trisolarans' Culture Reflects on Earth
text.text:
The Earth's culture is affected by the Trisolarans. The Trisolaran culture gradually becomes the mainstream on Earth.

This lays the fondation of the humanity's future.

text.headline: The Second Trisolaris Fleet Is Launched
text.text: The Second Trisolaris Fleet is launched at a speed that is close to lightspeed.

text.headline: Detterence Fails
text.text: Under the influence of the Trisolarans, Cheng Xin becomes the new Swordholder. At the moment that Cheng takes office, the Trisolarans launch an attack on the Dark Forest Deterrence facility. Cheng chooses not to activate the deterrence system. The facility is destroyed by the Trisolarans, marking the end of the Deterrence Era.

text.headline: The Cosmic Broadcast
text.text: One of the two escaped spaceships launchs cosmic broadcast. Trisolaris' and the Earth's positions are exposed in the universe. Trisolarans' invasion fails. The Dark Forest Strike is imminent.

text.headline: Trisolaris Is Destroyed
text.text: The Trisolaris solar system is destroyed by Photoid. The remaining Trisolarans are less than one-thousandth of the original population.

text.headline: Three Fairy Tales
text.text: in the Trisolaran spaceship, Yun Tianming tells Cheng three important information through three fairy tales that he created. By decoding the three fairy tales, government launchs three projects used to avoid the upcoming Dark Forest Strike: Black Domain Project, Bunker Project, and Lightspeed Spaceship Project.

text.headline: Curvature Engine Is Banned
text.text: Regarding escapism, the government announces that research and experiments on the Curvature Engine are illegal. The Lightspeed Spaceship Project is stalled.

text.headline: Bunker Project Is Completed
text.text: The Bunker Project is completed. Humans relocate to bunkers. Star Ring Corporation is established. Thomas Wade takes over the position of CEO from Cheng. The company is secretly researching the Curvature Engine.

text.headline: Secret Is Exposed
text.text: The secret research is exposed and stalled.

text.headline: The Dual-Vector Foil
text.text: Singer Civilization casually hurls a Dual-Vector Foil towards the Earth.

text.headline: Civilization's End
text.text: The Dual-Vector Foil arrives in the Solar System. The Solar System, along with humanity, is two-dimensionalized except a spaceship. Cheng escapes to the DX3906 solar system aboard the only successfully developed lightspeed spaceship, Star Ring.
